alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 3:19PM MST until March 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts on the benches. * WHERE...Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected Tuesday night into Wednesday, impacting the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
